version_description: This version fixes various bugs and brings some minor performance improvements to the app, and specifically to the Chat feature.
This version brings performance improvements to the app startup and the community chat.
This version improves the sign-in process, and adds contextual help to the sign-in UI.
This version improves the in-app chat functionality and speed.
This release brings some technical changes that will bring better scalability to the network's infrastructure, and will help alleviate the recent app crashes reported by some users.
